decision_conditions: This consent shall expire at the end of the period of five years beginning with the date of the decision notice.Reason: To comply the requirements of Regulation 14 (7) and (8) of the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) (England) Regulations 2007.

Upon the expiry of this consent, any advertisements hereby approved shall be removed and the use of the site for the display of advertisements shall be discontinued, and the advertisements hereby permitted shall not benefit from deemed consent under Class 14 in Part 1 of Schedule 3 to the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) (England) Regulations 2007. Reason: To ensure the advertisements are removed following the expiry of the consent and allow an opportunity to monitor the site and surrounding for any adverse impacts upon the operation of the highway, and review the cumulative impact of advertisements on visual amenity in a potentially changing area  (Policy Q17 of the Lambeth Local Plan 2021)

The advertisement(s) hereby approved shall not be erected or maintained in any manner or use other than that approved by this consent. The advertisement(s) shall be erected strictly in accordance with the approved plans.Reason: To ensure no adverse impact on amenity or safety and comply the requirements of Regulation 14 (4) of the Town & Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) (England) Regulations 2007 (Policy Q17 of the Lambeth Local Plan 2021)

The illuminated signage, hereby permitted must operate must operate below the limits set out in the Institute of Lighting Professionals (ILP) publication: "The Brightness of Illuminated Advertisements" (PLG05, January 2015). The illuminations must operate at a maximum illumination level of 600cd/m2 between dusk and dawn.Reason: To ensure the safe operation of the adjacent highway.  (Policy Q17 of the Lambeth Local Plan 2021).

There shall be no special effects (including noise, smell, smoke, animation, exposed cold cathode tubing, flashing, scrolling, three dimensional, intermittent or video elements) of any kind.Reason: To ensure the safe operation of the adjacent highway.  (Policy Q17 of the Lambeth Local Plan 2021).
